# Trip Expense Manager - Hackathon Project

## Project Overview
A web-based trip expense sharing application built for a 5-hour hackathon.

## Tech Stack
- **Backend**: Express.js + TypeScript + SQLite
- **Frontend**: React + Vite + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
- **Sync**: Polling (15-second intervals)

## Core Features (Priority Order)
### P0 - MVP Core
- Trip creation with room code generation
- Join trip via room code
- Add expenses with equal split
- Balance calculation
- Basic settlement plan

### P1 - Enhanced MVP
- Room locking & admin controls
- Custom & percentage splits
- Expense history

## Development Status
- [x] Project structure created
- [ ] Backend implementation
- [ ] Frontend implementation
- [ ] Testing and deployment
